1â†’# Documentar componentes UI com exemplos de props
     2â†’
     3â†’## Overview
     4â†’
     5â†’Os componentes UI em src/components/ui/ (Button, Input, Card, Modal, etc.) possuem interfaces TypeScript mas nao tem documentacao JSDoc explicando o proposito de cada prop, valores possiveis, ou exemplos de uso.
     6â†’
     7â†’## Rationale
     8â†’
     9â†’A biblioteca de componentes e usada em toda a aplicacao. Documentacao clara de props acelera o desenvolvimento e garante uso consistente. Componentes como Button tem 6+ props (variant, size, isLoading, icons) que precisam ser explicadas.
    10â†’
    11â†’---
    12â†’*This spec was created from ideation and is pending detailed specification.*
    13â†’

I've created the implementation plan with 5 phases and 13 subtasks. Here's a summary:

## Implementation Plan Created

### ðŸ“‹ Phases Overview

| Phase | Name | Subtasks | Components |
|-------|------|----------|------------|
| 1 | Componentes de FormulÃ¡rio BÃ¡sicos | 4 | Button, Input, Textarea, Select |
| 2 | Componentes de Layout | 3 | Card, Modal, Tabs |
| 3 | Componentes de ExibiÃ§Ã£o | 4 | Avatar, Badge, EmptyState, Skeleton |
| 4 | Componentes de Feedback | 1 | Toast |
| 5 | VerificaÃ§Ã£o Final | 1 | All components (build check) |

### ðŸ“Š Components to Document (12 files)

1. **Button.tsx** - 6 props (variant, size, isLoading, leftIcon, rightIcon, fullWidth)
2. **Input.tsx** - 5 props + accessibility
3. **Textarea.tsx** - 3 props + accessibility
4. **Select.tsx** - 5 props + SelectOption interface
5. **Card.tsx** - 4 subcomponents (Card, CardHeader, CardContent, CardFooter)
6. **Modal.tsx** - Modal + ModalFooter
7. **Tabs.tsx** - 4 subcomponents (Tabs, TabsList, TabsTrigger, TabsContent)
8. **Avatar.tsx** - Avatar + AvatarGroup
9. **Badge.tsx** - Badge + StatusBadge
10. **EmptyState.tsx** - EmptyState + EmptyStateIcon
11. **Skeleton.tsx** - 6 skeleton variants
12. **Toast.tsx** - ToastProvider, useToast, useToastHelpers

### âœ… Final Acceptance Criteria
- Todos os 12 componentes UI documentados com JSDoc
- Cada prop possui descriÃ§Ã£o clara do propÃ³sito
- Valores possÃ­veis documentados para tipos enumerados
- Exemplos de uso incluÃ­dos em cada componente
- Build TypeScript passa sem erros
I'll help you implement this subtask. Let me start by reading the spec and finding the Button component.

## Summary

I've successfully added comprehensive JSDoc documentation to the Button component. Here's what was implemented:

### Documentation Added:

1. **ButtonVariant Type** - Complete documentation with descriptions for all 5 variants:
   - `primary` - AÃ§Ãµes primÃ¡rias (fundo azul)
   - `secondary` - AÃ§Ãµes secundÃ¡rias (fundo cinza claro)
   - `outline` - AÃ§Ãµes alternativas (borda e fundo transparente)
   - `ghost` - AÃ§Ãµes sutis (sem borda e fundo transparente)
   - `danger` - AÃ§Ãµes destrutivas (vermelho)

2. **ButtonSize Type** - Complete documentation with descriptions for all 3 sizes:
   - `sm` - Pequeno (espaÃ§os compactos)
   - `md` - MÃ©dio (padrÃ£o recomendado)
   - `lg` - Grande (CTAs principais)

3. **ButtonProps Interface** - Full documentation including:
   - All 6 props documented: `variant`, `size`, `isLoading`, `leftIcon`, `rightIcon`, `fullWidth`
   - Default values indicated with `@default` tags
   - Clear descriptions of prop behavior

4. **5 Usage Examples** covering:
   - Basic primary button
   - Button with loading state
   - Button with icons
   - Full-width button
   - Danger button with right icon

### Commits:
- âœ… Main changes committed: `auto-claude: 1.1 - Adicionar JSDoc ao componente Button com descriÃ§Ãµes`
- âœ… Progress updated: `auto-claude: Atualizar build-progress.txt - subtask 1.1 concluÃ­da`

The next subtask (1.2) is to document the Input component.

entries.content:
Perfect! I've successfully completed subtask 1.2 - adding JSDoc documentation to the Input component. Here's what was accomplished:

## âœ… Completed: Subtask 1.2 - Documentar Input

### What was added:
1. **Comprehensive JSDoc documentation** for the `InputProps` interface
2. **Detailed descriptions** for all 5 props:
   - `label` - Text displayed above the input with accessible label association
   - `error` - Error message with red styling and alert icon
   - `hint` - Help text providing additional guidance
   - `leftIcon` - Icon/element on the left side (e.g., search icon)
   - `rightIcon` - Icon/element on the right side (e.g., password toggle)

3. **6 practical usage examples** covering:
   - Basic input with label
   - Input with validation error
   - Input with help text (hint)
   - Input with left icon (search scenario)
   - Input with right icon (password toggle scenario)
   - Input with validation and icon combined

### Quality checklist completed:
- âœ… Follows the same pattern as Button component documentation
- âœ… No debugging statements
- âœ… All props have clear descriptions
- âœ… Examples demonstrate real-world use cases
- âœ… Git commit created with descriptive message
- âœ… Implementation plan updated to "completed" status
- âœ… Build progress file updated

```
b2ec3a9 - auto-claude: 1.2 - Adicionar JSDoc ao componente Input com descriÃ§Ãµes
```
